issue.title: [CF 211] chatmessage: A new version of ...
issue.body:
For some time i get a chatmessage which says: TellMeWhen: A new version of TellMeWhen is available: 4.1.4

I think i got this message first around your update 4.1.4.2, but iÂ´m not sure about this. i allways use your latest alpha or release candidate. now i`m at 4.2.1 but still getting this message saying a "new" version is available. plops up in chat at random timeintervals. no lua error, no other problems.


> Posted by CurseForge user Rhyn23 | Imported from CurseForge issue #211 | Raw

comments.body:
In 4.1.4, I accidentally added an extra digit to the internal version number, making it about 40,000 higher than it should be. This is the number that is sent to other users of TMW to tell you that there is a new version. if you would like to see who the version checks are coming from, type "/run TMW.debug = 1" as soon as you log in. Once you get a version warning from someone, you will see something like this:

TMW: TMWV M:4.1.4^m:^R:414069^ GUILD Cybeloras

The last thing there is the name of the person that the version warning came from. Whisper them and tell them to update to the latest version.

Edited May 28, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
